name: Weird Date (Demo)
description:
Waking up one day in the middle of nowhere, you are met with a gentle and anxious void. As the creature introduces you to 3 others, you are met with a choice of 4 dates!

Void: A loving void who owns a tavern in the middle of nowhere. They are often kind and caring, though sometimes come off as weird.

Tv: A tv head who grows plants for a living! She's very open and exciting, always up for a new adventure.

Ghost: Either a person with a sheet on their head or another headless creature. They are very over emotional most days.

Box: A edgy box head who doesn't talk much. He likes to listen to music and disappearing to odd places. 

Go one dates, and find out the mysteries that this new world is trying it's best to hide from you.

This is a multiple ending game, that I will be doing my best to update! Though this demo might stay just this and nothing more, while I release the full game much later.

If you'd like to stick around, it'd mean a lot :]

Also, thank you to Ethan for being the main reason I made this!
